title: Drawing, "Figures for a sepulchral monument"

Drawing, "Figures for a sepulchral monument".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-1323.
